snippet.title: Zombieland VR: Headshot Fever - 'The Invitational' announce with VR Master League (Quest Capture)
snippet.description:
Buy Zombieland VR: Headshot Fever on Oculus Quest: https://ocul.us/31ew8G9

Broadcast live during the 2021 SXSW Gaming Awards, produced by IGN, professional esports commentator Alex “Goldenboy” Medez hosted online content creators Cerberusarms, Naysy, ProjectJamesify, and Dan Ryckert (formerly of Giant Bomb) who battled it out to become the first ever Zombieland Invitational champion.

Sony Pictures Virtual Reality (SPVR) and XR Games also announced a partnership with the VR Master League (VRML) to organise the Zombieland Invitational esports events this year. And confirmed that the game will release for Oculus Quest on Thursday March 25th 2021.

Players who want to take their skills to the next level can sign up now for the upcoming Zombieland Invitational by visiting zombielandvrgame.com.

- - - 

Survive ferocious zombies and enjoy the dystopian humour of Zombieland as Tallahassee, Wichita, Columbus and Little Rock train you to run the fastest, most dangerous zombie-killing race course ever devised - the Zombieland Invitational!

'Zombieland: Headshot Fever' combines classic arcade light-gun shooting with split-second racing mechanics. Two quick headshots turn the world slow, giving players more time to rack up combos, get faster times and claw their way to the top of the leaderboards with awesome weapons, powerful upgrades and head-popping, clock-stopping, zombie-killing arcade action!

FEATURES:
Bullet time 2.0 in the form of our Adrenaline System. Use it to rack up those combos!
Powerful weapons, upgrades and perks!
Climb the leaderboards to become the fastest zombie killer on the planet!
Improve your skills in our shooting-range!
Built for VR to bring light-gun shooters back from the dead, and into your home!

- - - - - - 

Website: https://www.zombielandvrgame.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/zombielandvr
Twitter: https://twitter.com/xrgamesvr
Instagram: https://instagram.com/xrgamesvr
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@xrgamesvr
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/xrgamesvr
